titles.title: Healthy Children and Families Act of 2007

A bill to amend title XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to provide States with the option to provide nurse home visitation services under Medicaid and the State Children's Health Insurance Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: 3/29/2007--Introduced. Healthy Children and Families Act of 2007 - Amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to provide states with the option to provide evidence-based nurse home visitation services under Medicaid and the SCHIP programs.
